mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_quality_manage (company_id, year, month, quality_check,quality_check_pass,quality_check_fail,security_event,quality_check_unmodified,create_time) VALUES (#{companyId},#{year},#{month},#{qualityCheck},#{qualityCheckPass},#{qualityCheckFail},#{securityEvent},#{qualityCheckUnmodified},#{createTime})
INSERT INTO sys_quality_manage_file (quality_id, file_name, file_url, file_size,upload_time) VALUES (#{qualityId},#{fileName},#{fileUrl},#{fileSize},#{uploadTime})
mapper.update: update sys_quality_manage set status_code = 2 where quality_id = #{qualityId}

select
,company.company_name as companyName,COUNT(file.file_id) AS fileNum from sys_quality_manage as quality LEFT JOIN sys_company as company on quality.company_id=company.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_quality_manage_file AS file ON quality.quality_id = file.quality_id where 1=1 and quality.quality_id = #{qualityId} and quality.status_code!=2 GROUP BY quality.quality_id ORDER BY quality.create_time DESC

SELECT file_id AS fileId, quality_id AS qualityId, file_name AS fileName, file_size AS fileSize, file_url AS fileUrl FROM sys_quality_manage_file where 1=1 and quality_id = #{qualityId} and status_code!=2
